data.title: Isaac Angel Takes Over as Gilat Satellite Networks’ New Board Chairman
data.meta_description: Isaac Angel is the new chairman of the board of Gilat Satellite Networks, the company announced March 9. Angel takes over from Dov Baharav who has stepped
data.text:
Isaac Angel is the new chairman of the board of Gilat Satellite Networks, the company announced March 9. Angel takes over from Dov Baharav who has stepped down and retired after being in the role for seven years.

Angel serves as chairman of the board and served as CEO at Ormat Technologies Inc., a global company delivering renewable power and energy solutions. Before his seven-year tenure as an officer and director at Ormat, Angel held executive positions at LeadCom Integrated Solutions, VeriFone, and Lipman Electronic Engineering.

“Gilat has over 30 years of impressive global expertise, a strong customer base, outstanding innovative technology and talented employees, which well-positions Gilat for profitable growth. I am confident that the board will continue to successfully guide Gilat and play a significant part in its future accomplishments,” Angel said in a statement.
